entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -22.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 08:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -22.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -25.5°C
Wind: NNW 26 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
